info.title: Pineapple Apocalypse RPG
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Pineapple Apocalypse RPG is an RPG. Both the wiimote and classic controller are supported.

Controls:
Directional pad = Move
2 button = accept (when using wiimote)
A button = accept (when using classic controller)

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (Aeroplanes) by Nanodrone
8bc.org/members/Nanodrone/
